data.name: Policy Update
data.description: An agent has been told to fetch policy.

data.name: Scan Started
data.description: An agent has started scanning.

data.name: Scan Completed, No Detections
data.description: A scan has completed without detecting anything malicious.

data.name: Scan Completed With Detections
data.description: A scan has completed and detected malicious items.

data.name: Scan Failed
data.description: A scan has been attempted, and failed to run.

data.name: Threat Detected
data.description: A threat was found on this system.

data.name: Threat Quarantined
data.description: A threat was successfully quarantined.

data.name: Quarantine Failure
data.description: A detected threat was not successfully quarantined.

data.name: Quarantine Restore Requested
data.description: A request has been made to move a file from Quarantine back to its original location.

data.name: Quarantined Item Restored
data.description: An item has been pulled restored from Quarantine to its original location.

data.name: Quarantine Restore Failed
data.description: An item requested to be restored to its original location could not be restored.

data.name: Quarantine Request Failed to be Delivered
data.description: A request to restore an item from quarantine was not successfully sent.

data.name: Cloud Recall Restore from Quarantine
data.description: A retrospective restore was completed successfully.

data.name: Cloud Recall Quarantine Successful
data.description: A retrospective quarantine was completed successfully.

data.name: Cloud Recall Restore from Quarantine Failed
data.description: A retrospective restore was attemped and failed. Most likely the original location no longer exists.

data.name: Cloud Recall Quarantine Attempt Failed
data.description: A retrospective quarantine was attemped and failed. Most likely the original location no longer exists.

data.name: Install Started
data.description: An installation has begun.

data.name: Install Failure
data.description: An installation has failed.

data.name: Email Confirmation
data.description: Sent when a user account gets created.

data.name: Forgotten Password Reset
data.description: Sent when a user forgets password.

data.name: Password Has Been Reset
data.description: Sent when a user has reset his password.

data.name: Policy Update Failure
data.description: A policy update failed, and the policy was not successfully applied.

data.name: Cloud Recall Restore of False Positive
data.description: A file once thought to be malicious has been marked as clean and restored.

data.name: Cloud Recall Detection
data.description: A file once thought to be clean has been marked malicious.

data.name: Execution Blocked
data.description: Execution of an application was blocked.

data.name: Quarantine Restore Started
data.description: The restoring of a file from Quarantine was attempted.

data.name: Application Registered
data.description: An Application was registered.

data.name: Application Deregistered
data.description: An Application was deregistered.

data.name: Application Authorized
data.description: An Application authorized to access a portion of the API.

data.name: Application Deauthorized
data.description: An Application authorized to access a portion of the API.

data.name: APK Threat Detected
data.description: A threat was found on this system.

data.name: APK Custom Threat Detected
data.description: An apk matching an Android Simple Custom Detection was found on this system.

data.name: DFC Threat Detected
data.description: A connection has been detected by DFC.

data.name: Adobe Reader compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable file was downloaded and executed by Adobe Reader.

data.name: Microsoft Word compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable file was downloaded and executed by Microsoft Word.

data.name: Microsoft Excel compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable file was downloaded and executed by Microsoft Excel.

data.name: Microsoft PowerPoint compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable file was downloaded and executed by Microsoft PowerPoint.

data.name: Adobe Reader launched a shell
data.description: Adobe Reader executed an unknown application, which in turn launched a command shell.

data.name: Microsoft Word launched a shell
data.description: Microsoft Word executed an unknown application, which in turn launched a command shell.

data.name: Microsoft Excel launched a shell
data.description: Microsoft Excel executed an unknown application, which in turn launched a command shell.

data.name: Microsoft PowerPoint launched a shell
data.description: Microsoft PowerPoint executed an unknown application, which in turn launched a command shell.

data.name: Apple QuickTime compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable file was downloaded and executed by Apple QuickTime.

data.name: Apple QuickTime launched a shell
data.description: Apple QuickTime executed an unknown application, which in turn launched a command shell.

data.name: Executed malware
data.description: The computer executed known malware

data.name: Suspected botnet connection
data.description: The computer made outbound connections to suspected botnet command and control systems.

data.name: Reboot Pending
data.description: An agent has started the reboot process

data.name: Reboot Completed
data.description: An agent has completed its reboot

data.name: Cloud IOC
data.description: Suspicious behavior that indicates possible compromise of the computer

data.name: Microsoft Calculator compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable file was downloaded and executed by Microsoft Calculator.

data.name: Microsoft Notepad compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable file was downloaded and executed by Microsoft Notepad.

data.name: File Fetch Completed
data.description: The request for a remote file was successful

data.name: File Fetch Failed
data.description: The request for a remote file failed

data.name: Endpoint IOC Scan Started
data.description: Endpoint IOC Scan Started

data.name: Endpoint IOC Scan Completed, No Detections
data.description: Endpoint IOC Scan Completed, No Detections

data.name: Endpoint IOC Scan Completed With Detections
data.description: Endpoint IOC Scan Completed With Detections

data.name: Endpoint IOC Scan Failed
data.description: Endpoint IOC Scan Failed

data.name: Endpoint IOC Definition Update Failure
data.description: Endpoint IOC Definition Update Failure

data.name: Endpoint IOC Definition Update Success
data.description: Endpoint IOC Definition Update Success

data.name: Endpoint IOC Configuration Update Failure
data.description: Endpoint IOC Configuration Update Failure

data.name: Endpoint IOC Configuration Update Success
data.description: Endpoint IOC Configuration Update Success

data.name: Endpoint IOC Scan Detection Summary
data.description: Endpoint IOC Scan Detection Summary

data.name: Connection to suspicious domain
data.description: The computer made an outbound connection to a domain that is similar to randomly generated domains used by some malware command and control systems.

data.name: Threat Detected in Low Prevalence Executable
data.description: Threat Detected in Low Prevalence Executable

data.name: Vulnerable Application Detected
data.description: Vulnerable Application Detected

data.name: Suspicious Download
data.description: A suspicious file was downloaded.

data.name: Microsoft CHM Compromise
data.description: A suspicious portable executable was downloaded and executed by Microsoft Help.

data.name: Suspicious Cscript Launch
data.description: It triggers when Internet Explorer launches Command Shell which in turn launches Microsoft Windows Script Host (aka cscript)

data.name: Update: Reboot Required
data.description: It triggers when the new connector is installed but not running

data.name: Update: Reboot Advised
data.description: It triggers when the new connector is installed and running but some new driver features will not be available until the system is rebooted

data.name: Update: Unexpected Reboot Required
data.description: It triggers when the new connector is installed but not running for some unexpected scenario

data.name: Product Update Failed
data.description: A product update has failed.

data.name: Product Update Started
data.description: A product update has begun.

data.name: Product Update Completed
data.description: A product update has successfully completed

data.name: Potential Ransomware
data.description: The computer may be infected with ransomware.

data.name: Possible Webshell
data.description: The computer may have been compromised granting remote access.

data.name: Exploit Prevention
data.description: An exploit was prevented from running

data.name: Critical Fault Raised
data.description: A critical fault has been raised

data.name: Major Fault Raised
data.description: A major fault has been raised

data.name: Minor Fault Raised
data.description: A minor fault has been raised

data.name: Fault Cleared
data.description: A fault has been cleared

data.name: Rootkit Detection
data.description: A threat was found hidden on this system.

data.name: Malicious Activity Detection
data.description: A malicious activity is detected

data.name: iOS Network Detection
data.description: It reports the conviction of a network connection

data.name: Malicious Activity Block
data.description: A malicious activity has been blocked

data.name: System Process Protection
data.description: An access to a process or registry has been blocked

data.name: Endpoint Isolation Start Success
data.description: An agent has been isolated successfully

data.name: Endpoint Isolation Start Failure
data.description: The agent isolation has been failed

data.name: Endpoint Isolation Stop Success
data.description: An agent has stopped to be isolated

data.name: Endpoint Isolation Stop Failure
data.description: The agent failed to stop being isolated

data.name: Endpoint Isolation Update Success
data.description: An isolated agent has been updated successfully

data.name: Endpoint Isolation Update Failure
data.description: An isolated agent update has been failed

data.name: Orbital Install Success
data.description: Orbital has been installed successfully

data.name: Orbital Install Failure
data.description: Orbital installation failed

data.name: Orbital Update Success
data.description: Orbital version has been updated successfully

data.name: Orbital Update Failure
data.description: Orbital version can not be updated

data.name: Endpoint Isolation Unlock Limit Reached
data.description: An isolated agent has failed to unlock with the unlock code too many times

data.name: Potential Dropper Infection
data.description: Potential dropper infections indicate a single file is repeatedly attempting to download malware onto a computer.

data.name: Multiple Infected Files
data.description: Multiple infected files indicate multiple files on a computer are attempting to download malware.

data.name: SecureX Threat Hunting Incident
data.description: When portal receives api call from RET and incident is created, this event is triggered and displayed.
